item.title: The WAV/MP3 Test
item.description: NYU students in the Audio for the Web Fall 2018 class test their friends to see if any of them can distinguish between WAV files and lossy compressed MP3 files.
item.itunes:summary: NYU students in the Audio for the Web Fall 2018 class test their friends to see if any of them can distinguish between WAV files and lossy compressed MP3 files.

item.title: The Mix: Mixing Basics
item.description: In this episode of The Mix, we sit down with two mixing engineers and NYU graduate Music Technology students on their personal mixing techniques. The mixing engineers featured are Fermin and Jonathan. Recording engineered by Fermin, Jonathan, and Jaye. Mixing and Editing by Jaye. Original music by Jaye.
item.itunes:summary: In this episode of The Mix, we sit down with two mixing engineers and NYU graduate Music Technology students on their personal mixing techniques. The mixing engineers featured are Fermin and Jonathan. Recording engineered by Fermin, Jonathan, and Jaye. Mixing and Editing by Jaye. Original music by Jaye.

item.title: Sounds of the Subway
item.description: Have you ever winced in pain when the 6 train screeches by during your morning commute? Have you ever wondered, "How loud really could New York's subways possibly be?" Madeleine and Sarah take a dive into the wild sonic abyss that is the New York City subway system.
item.itunes:summary: Have you ever winced in pain when the 6 train screeches by during your morning commute? Have you ever wondered, "How loud really could New York's subways possibly be?" Madeleine and Sarah take a dive into the wild sonic abyss that is the New York City subway system.
